Package burtis.modules.sync

This module controls time flow of simulation, dictating clock ticks to all other modules.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SyncEventHandler
    Handles incoming events by calling appropriate SynchronizationModule methods.
    SynchronizationModule
    Synchronisation source for all time-dependent modules along with a module failure controller.
    TickService
    Controls thread responsible for sending ticks.
    WatchdogService
    Implements thread controlling liveness of modules.
    WatchedModule
    Class representing module.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    WatchedModule.State
    Describes module state known to SynchronizationModule.

Package burtis.modules.sync Description

This module controls time flow of simulation, dictating clock ticks to all other modules. Additionally, it checks whether modules described as critical don't lag behind - if that's the case, simulation is terminated immediately.
Author:
Mikołaj Sowiński
